name: Nautical Trivia Trivia Game | Transport | 5 Questions

questions.text: What is a short deck built across the back of a ship known as?
questions.explanation:
Poop deck.

	It was a shory deck built over and after part of the spar deck.

questions.text: Which boat, the Nina, the Pinta or the Santa Maria, sank after hitting a coral reef?
questions.explanation:
Santa Maria.

	It was wrecked off the coast of Hispaniola.

questions.text: How many sails would be up if a five masted ship was under full sail?
What was the name of Henry Hudson's most famous ship?
questions.explanation:
Half Moon.

	His first two voyages were made on the Hopewell and a final voyage was made on the Discovery but the one that is better known is the third voyage on the Half Moon.

questions.text: Where was the USS Lexington sunk during World War 2?
questions.explanation:
Coral Sea.

	This battle was fought on May 7-8, 1942. The Americans lost a destroyer and a tanker also. The carrier Yorktown was damaged also.
